Before joining Aarhus University I was a postdoctoral fellow of FWO and worked at the DistriNet research group of the Computer Science department of KU Leuven where I also obtained my PhD in May 2018.Contact information:timany@cs.au.dkAabogade 34, DK-8200 Aarhus N, DenmarkOffice: Turing–213https://github.com/amintimanyhttps://www.linkedin.com/in/amintimany/https://orcid.org/0000-0002-2237-851X
